title: A New Beginning
content: Your journey begins now. Keep your wits sharp, for the path ahead is filled with unknowns.

title: A Cryptic Clue
content: The first step to finding the truth lies within your reflection. What do you see when you look into the mirror?

title: Whispers in the Wind
content: You hear faint whispers, almost inaudible. They speak of something buried deep within the earth. Seek it out.

title: A Mysterious Symbol
content: A strange symbol has appeared before you. It looks familiar, yet you cannot place where you’ve seen it. Could it be a key to the next step?

title: The Hidden Door
content: There is a door you’ve walked past countless times. Today, it seems different. Do you dare to open it and discover what lies beyond?

title: The Unseen Hand
content: A figure stands just out of sight. It beckons you, but you cannot see their face. What are they trying to tell you?

title: The Final Puzzle
content: The pieces are coming together. All that remains is the final puzzle. Can you solve it before time runs out?
